remarks: In case ` x ` is not free in ` B ` , disjointness is not so interesting since it reduces to cases where ` A ` is a singleton.  (Google Groups discussion with Peter Masza) (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 26-Jul-2018.)
statement:
disjnf $p |- ( Disj_ x e. A B <-> ( B = (/) \/ E* x x e. A ) ) $.
